H0.text: What is the general term for heat energy that has been drawnfrom under the ground. Thermogeon

H1.text: What is the general term for heat energy that has been drawnfrom under the ground. Subterrame

H2.text: What is the general term for heat energy that has been drawnfrom under the ground. Geoheat

H3.text: What is the general term for heat energy that has been drawnfrom under the ground. Geotherm

A4.text: Geothermal energy is thermal energy extracted from the Earth's crust.
